name: Neon Madness (RussetBear)
description:
What happens if You mix pong, breakout and bullet hell games? You are about to find out. Play co-op with a friend or alone with the help of an AI.

Protect all people and destroy all enemies with their own reflected bullets to advance to the next wave, with the occasionals boss battle inbetween.

At this stage, this is a gameplay demo for tryout, with minimalistic graphic elements, and short content (5 levels).

Controls:

Left Player: WS to move up/down, AD to rotate

Right Player: UP/DOWN ARROW  to move up/down, LEFT/RIGHT ARROW to rotate
